mapper.insert:

id,
contractId,
userId,
code,
fileName,
suffix,
savePathFile,
addDate,

modifiedDate,
modifiedUser,
modifiedIp,
#{id},
#{contractId},
#{userId},
#{code},
#{fileName},
#{suffix},
#{savePathFile},
#{addDate},
#{addUser},
#{addIp},
#{modifiedDate},
#{modifiedUser},

SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
mapper.update:
UPDATE attachment
id = #{id},
contractId = #{contractId},
code = #{code},
fileName = #{fileName},
suffix = #{suffix},
savePathFile = #{savePathFile},
addDate = #{addDate},
addUser = #{addUser},
addIp = #{addIp},
modifiedDate = #{modifiedDate},
modifiedUser = #{modifiedUser},
modifiedIp = #{modifiedIp},
WHERE id = #{id}
AND modified = #{original}
